divs: Sighting Detailstoo much happened over a two night period. I have written an account that I will give to you for your records. Wild pulsing lights, the ground thumping like a heart beat, the ufo's following us from field to field. My account is almost complete and I will be glad to pass it on to you for your records. I hope this will satisfy your questions. Sincerely Ilona E. Weber
Summary: triangle one light on top none on bottom
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Pine Bush
There were no other sightings in Pine Bush on or around September 25th 1994
Viewing Distance: 20 Feet or Less, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
